content: Updated test cases to include North and East directions

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Good puzzle. Easy to understand. Solved in 9 minutes with no problems. The order thing was a little tricky, but figured it out and learned something from it!

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I really enjoyed coding this one, you have a nice explanation and good tests, you may want to emphasize the reordering part because I didn't notice it at first, but I understood it once I failed that test, so it may just work out, up to you.
